name: Daenerys Miracle
description:
Daenerys Miracle is a nervous third person shooter.

Defeat enemy monsters with various weapons in multiple maps.
With secondary objectives!

Exciting experience on maps such as Misterious Forest, Underworl, Fantasy Village, Ancient Desert

  • 10 levels
  • Endless mode
  • 5 camera angles
  • Firearms (assault rifle, shotgun, sniper, laser rifle, rocket launcher)
  • AI with different abilities
  • Secondary objectives
